JSM - JavaScript Matrix library

library.description:
CropZoom is a plugin that let you select an area of an image and then crop it.

whit this tool you also will be able to zoom in or to zoom out, to drag and also rotate an image.

this plugin needs ui.droppable, ui.resizable, ui.slider from JQuery UI to work.

Some code was taken from jquery.svgdom.js Written by Keith Wood.
library.name: CropZoom

library.description: A jQuery Plugin to resize images to fit in a container
library.name: imgLiquid

library.description: Shadow.js is a simple & lightweight JavaScript library, which allows you to give shadow to your images.
library.name: shadow.js

library.description: Parse and stringify the HTML  srcset attribute.
library.name: srcset

library.description:
Responsive Img swaps out an image's src attribute based on its container's width when the DOM is ready and when the browser is resized.

Using a PHP file, Responsive Img creates new images on the fly the first time they're needed and puts them on your server.

In addition, Responsive Img recognizes pixel ratio and uses larger images for Retina display and other displays with different pixel sizes.
library.name: Responsive Img
